unnormalised: Guess what, folks? India's renewable energy sector is buzzing! Dr. Sharma at IIT-Bombay just announced a breakthrough in solar panel efficiency, potentially increasing energy output by 15%! Amazing, right?
normalised: Guess what, folks? India's renewable energy sector is buzzing! Doctor Sharma at I I T-Bombay just announced a breakthrough in solar panel efficiency, potentially increasing energy output by fifteen percent! Amazing, right?

unnormalised: And that's not all. Rajasthan Renewable Energy Corporation Ltd. (RRECL) just inaugurated a 500 MW solar park near Jodhpur. Think of all that clean energy!
normalised: And that is not all. Rajasthan Renewable Energy Corporation Limited (R R E C L) just inaugurated a five hundred megawatt solar park near Jodhpur. Think of all that clean energy!

unnormalised: Plus, the government's "Green India Mission" is pushing for even more ambitious targets. They're aiming for 500 GW of renewable energy by 2030. That's a HUGE step towards a greener future for all of us.
normalised: Plus, the government's "Green India Mission" is pushing for even more ambitious targets. They are aiming for five hundred gigawatt of renewable energy by two thousand and thirty. That is a huge step towards a greener future for all of us.

unnormalised: My local sabziwala, Ramesh Bhai, is even considering installing solar panels on his shop roof – a 200 sq ft area! Imagine the savings on his electricity bills! This could save him Rs. 5000 a month! Talk about a win-win! Even small changes can make a big difference. Let's all do our bit!
normalised: My local sabziwala, Ramesh Bhai, is even considering installing solar panels on his shop roof – a two hundred square feet area! Imagine the savings on his electricity bills! This could save him rupee five thousand a month! Talk about a win-win! Even small changes can make a big difference. Let us all do our bit!
